project_plan.name: Command-Line Temperature Converter Tool
project_plan.description: Create a command-line Python tool that converts temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. The tool will allow the user to specify the input temperature and the desired output unit.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion functions (Celsius to Fahrenheit, Fahrenheit to Celsius, Celsius to Kelvin, Kelvin to Celsius, Fahrenheit to Kelvin, Kelvin to Fahrenheit)
Implement user input handling to get the input temperature and the desired output unit from the user
Write tests for each of the temperature conversion functions
Execute tests to ensure that all conversion functions work correctly
